short_summary: Request for Proposal for landscaping services
description: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation needs landscape maintenance services on Grantville Island in Vancouver, British Columbia.",
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Landscaping Services for Granville Island**
=====================================

**Reference Number: CB-366-90216164**
--------------------------------------

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for landscaping services on Granville Island in Vancouver, British Columbia. This solicitation seeks a service provider to maintain and improve the landscape features of this public space.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Tender Number:** 002541
*   **Opening Date:** 2024-01-15
*   **Closing Date:** 2024-02-15 15:00:00
*   **Proposed Start Date:** 2024-04-01
*   **Proposed End Date:** 2029-03-31
*   **Expected Value:** Up to $2,500,000.00 CDN, including taxes

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The selected contractor will provide all necessary labor, supervision, materials, tools, and equipment to continuously maintain all aspects of the landscape. This includes:

*   Weekly mowing and pruning to maintain neat and tidy appearance
*   Seasonal planting, primp, and maintenance of gardens, trees, and other landscape features
*   Mitigation of vehicular and pedestrian traffic, as well as atmospheric conditions
*   Coordination of skilled horticulture operations to improve the health and visual display quality of the landscape plantings

**Mandatory Site Visit**
----------------------

A mandatory site visit is scheduled to take place on February 1, 2024, at 10:00 a.m. (PDT). All interested RFP proponents are required to participate.

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

All RFP proponents must register on the CARM system via the Bidtender Website by the closing date. Terms and conditions are outlined in the RFP document.

**Additional Information**
------------------------

Package 1: Services d’entretien paysagers

Package 2: Maintenance of the lawns and gardens of Granville islands 

And other many other forms and attachments which are linked and attached to this document. 

Prospects contact: Sara Brady

Address: CHMC National office Building.(700)
